'''''Mithrandir''''' is a [[1974]] study of [[Gandalf]] and the [[Wizards]] in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
==Contents==
*Introduction
*Part One: ''The Fellowship of the Ring''
*Part Two: ''The Two Towers''
*Part Three: ''The Return of the King''
*Footnotes
